thread.section_title: Print24 Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Print24 | print24.com
thread.title: jgc1457

author: jgc1457
title: jgc1457
text: This was my first order from Print24, which I placed with them mainly because it was over Â£200 cheaper than I had found elsewhere. The automated communication during the print process was outstanding, with an email arriving each time my job moved from one step to the next, so I always knew where it was up to. The finished pallet of print arrived a day earlier than promised too, so even though Print24 is one of the cheapest firms I've come across, it also has amongst the best customer service I've experienced. Very impressed indeed and looking forward to trying some of their other products (they have a huuuge product portfolio!)
